title: Cannot Pan Properly
body: Recently, my main window has a bar at the top that says, "League of Legends (TM) Client."  The game is not quite full screen.  It makes it very difficult to pan, especially when trying to move up.  I thought it was a maximize window problem, but I can't seem to maximize it.  Anyone else have this issue - it is eating me alive in-game - I can't move!

replies.body: ctrl enter does not work.  There is the familiar line, box, and red x in top right, but the box (maximize) is greyed out.  It will not go full screen.
You should be able to put your window back in fullscreen by hitting ctrl+enter or changing that option in the game settings.
